headline: Kroger Co (KR) Affirms Commitment to Shareholder Value with Dividend Hike
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) is one of the 10 best organic food and farming stocks to buy now. On June 26, the company reiterated its commitment to shareholders’ value by announcing a 9% increase in its annual dividend. The retail giant has increased its annual dividend to $1.40 per share from $1.20, resulting in a […]
